sentences.en: He disclaim the ownership of the dog.
Lawspirit, its affiliates, subsidiaries and the Licensors expressly disclaim all warranties not stated in this EULA.
sentences.cn: 其联属公司 、 子公司及许可人明确放弃本EULA中未载明的所有保证.
科学家们立刻否认了这种可能性.

sentences.en: She disclaims any knowledge of her husband's business.
sentences.cn: 她声称自己对她丈夫的生意一无所知。

sentences.en: The manufacturers disclaim all responsibility for damage caused by mistake.
sentences.cn: 制造商不承认对使用不当而造成的损坏负任何责任.

sentences.en: The manufacturers disclaim all responsibility for damage caused by misuse.
sentences.cn: 使用不当而造成的损坏,生产厂家不负任何责任.

sentences.en: The manufacturers disclaim all responsibility for the damage caused by misuse.
sentences.cn: 因使用不当造成的损坏,生产厂家不负任何责任.

sentences.en: The trustee may intervene and disclaim the contract.
sentences.cn: 管理人有可能出面干涉,并拒绝承认所签订的合同.

sentences.en: You must be able to disclaim all of your worldly possessions without becoming disconsolate.
sentences.cn: 你必须做到放弃你财产而无半点悲伤.

words.tran_cn: 不承诺，免责声明；放弃，拒绝

trans.tran_cn: 放弃, 弃权, 拒绝
trans.tran_en: to state, especially officially, that you are not responsible for something, that you do not know about it, or that you are not involved with it
